title-part.text: HEAT-EXCHANGE APPARATUS, NOT PROVIDED FOR IN ANOTHER SUBCLASS, IN WHICH THE HEAT-EXCHANGE MEDIA DO NOT COME INTO DIRECT CONTACT

reference.text: fluid heaters having heat generating means and heat transferring means F24H; furnaces F27; details of heat-exchange apparatus of general

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Heat-exchange apparatus having stationary conduit assemblies for one heat-exchange medium only, the media being in contact with different sides of the conduit wall, in which the other heat-exchange medium is a large body of fluid, e.g. domestic or motor car radiators
with heat-exchange conduits immersed in the body of fluid

note-paragraph.CPC-specific-note: Particular use of heat exchangers is classified in F28D21/00 and subgroups, whereas additionally the type of the heat exchangers is classified in the groups F28D1/00 - F28D20/00
